Sapna Choudhary Height | Age | Wiki | Biography | Family | Dance | Photos

Bolly Reporter
2 months ago

Sapna Choudhary is a famous Haryanvi dancer mainly perform on Hindi Ragni, Haryanvi songs from Rohtak. She proved herself as one of the best Indian Dancer. Sapna completed her schooling from govt school of Rohtak. After that, she comes into stage dancing. Earlier in this industry, she faced strong struggler. But finally, god listed her hard work.

Biography & Wiki

Sapna Choudhary’s real name is Sushmita. She was born on 25 September 1990 in Mahipalpur, Delhi, India. Hence, her current age is 29 years. She is born in a Hindu Jat family. Sapna Choudhary’s Zodiac is Libra. Her hometown is Najafgarh, Delhi, India.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Sapna Choudhary’s father’s name is Late. Mr. Choudhary who is a private company owner. Her mother’s name is Neelam Sherawat, who is a homemaker. She has an elder sister. Also, Her brother’s name is Karan Choudhary.

Sapna’sfamily members
Sapna Choudhary with her brother

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Sapna’s relationship status and her boy friend’s name is currently unknown. But there was rumored that she is having a relationship with Ajay Hooda.

Education and School, College

Sapna’s father had a job in Rohtak, where Sapna did her schooling from the Govt school of Rohtak. Later on, she completed her graduation from Visvesvaraya Technological University.

Favorites Things and Like & Dislike

Career

Sapna started her career with an orchestra team from Haryana. Also, She started her career by being a part of the team with Ragani artists. She used to participate in ragani programs in Haryana and in adjoining states with ragani parties in the beginning. After that Sapna started doing stage dance. Furthermore, Sapna danced to a Haryanvi song ‘Solid Body Rae‘ on the song released from More Music Company, that video became a hit. She has lent his voice to more than 20 songs. Her first Haryanvi Song is Sara rola patli kamar ka. This song was released in 2013. Moreover, Sapna Choudhary’s most popular song is Tu Cheej Lajwaab.

In 2017, she entered in Television with the popular reality show Bigg Boss 11 hosted by Salman Khan. Furthermore, she has been one of the most resplendent contestants Bigg Boss has ever witnessed. The winner of Bigg Boss 10, Manveer Gurjar was her favorite contestant. According to her, she is also as simple as him. In 2019 she debuts in Bollywood with Dosti Ke Side Effects, produced by Joyal Daniel and directed by Hadi Ali Abrar.

Salary and Net Worth

Sapna Choudhary’s salary per event is unknown. Her Net Worth is around $15 million.

Car collection

Sapna Choudhary has one Audi 4 and one Toyota Fortuner.

Contact Address

Sapna has a Bangalow in Najafgarh, Delhi

Controversies

In September 2016, she was accused of insulting a particular caste through a song at a stage show, after which a person called Satpal Tanwar ran an online campaign against her to harass her. As a result, she attempted suicide at her residence by consuming rat poison.

Facts about Sapna Choudhary

  • Sapna’s family has roots in Uttar Pradesh.
  • When she was born, her paternal aunt (Bua) named her ‘Sushmita’ after the Indian Miss Universe and actress Sushmita Sen.
  • According to some news portals, many people tagged her as a vulgar dancer, but she refused to accept that label.
  • In a video, Sapna said that if her dance is considered vulgar, then so must be of all the other Bollywood beauties.
  • Today, she is the most demanded stage performer in North India, especially Haryana.
  • Sapna has a tattoo on Neck, wrote “Desi Queen“
